11.title: 3rd Grader

choices: Head to the beach with Mary.
Head into town for some ice cream. (something happens along the way)
111.content:
As you rise from your bed, you start to yawn as you begin another day. You've had a lot of changes over the past year. Moving to another city, your mom adopting a daughter, and taking in two other boys, marrying Barbara and her twin sister April, and finding out Trish was just as squishy and malleable as you were. But probably the most positive change you've experienced is seeing yourself be on top for a change. While you've still found yourself getting splattered and eaten, there's been several times when a girl gets smushed under your butt, or has a stay in your own tummy. On top of that, you've quickly made friends with most of the boys in your class, as well as some of the girls.

You wish you could say you enjoy it. As fun as it is to not be on bottom, you find the amount of attention you've been getting to be off-putting, as people seem to gravitate to your bottom. It's somewhat annoying when you're trying to walk to school and some lady just yanks your shorts down and forces herself between your cheeks. You swear your waistline's expanded four sizes since you've moved.

Unfortunately, you're still just as big a target as ever. Gary is still one of the biggest thorns in your side, and to make matters worse, he's made friends in the form of the zombie boy, Gabe, and an alligator boy named Alex. And that's not even counting the older residents. Not even Mary's been able to help you, as she seems to be even more danger-prone than you are at times. You wish you could protect her, but there's just not much you're able to do.

Maybe today will go by without incident? Yeah right...

What's on the agenda for today?
111.title: Jack Harper

1111.content:
You smiled to yourself as you applied a heavy coat of sunscreen and got dressed, squeezing your legs through the holes of your swimsuit before stretching it over your plump brown butt and letting it snap, trying not to blush as you felt your flesh wobble. Today you were meeting Mary at the beach and spend the whole day with her. You slipped your feet into a pair of black sandals and headed over to meet up with your girlfriend. You couldn't help but grin as you made your way over. Mary was the sweetest and cutest girl in the world, and you were lucky to have her as a girlfriend. If there was a girl more perfect, you haven't met her yet. And even then, you were sure that Mary was the only girl for you. There wasn't anything you wouldn't do for her.

"Jackie! Over here!"
You turned your head and blushed as you saw her. Mary was standing in the sand wearing a cute pink and baby blue one-piece swimsuit, hopping up and down to get your attention.

"C-coming Mary!", you cried, grinning as you ran over, your eyes shut in innocent bliss.

"Over here, Jackie! I got us a spot!" Mary sat down and patted a space next to her. She was sitting on a white beach towel with a pink heart pattern, while she patted a towel next to her, a red robot-themed towel.

You smiled as you walked over and took your seat on the towel and sighed. "Thank you for going through the trouble of finding a spot for us, Mary", you said sweetly. "I got the whole day planned out. First, we're-" You were suddenly interrupted as you heard a loud *GULP* next to you, followed by muffled screaming. You turned your head and gasped as you saw that your beloved Mary had been stuffed down someone's throat and was currently nothing but a belly bulge!

Who is the predator that's ruined your perfect day?
1111.title: Date Gone Wrong

"Y-you...", you gulped in fear as you scooted away. "W-what're you doing here?!"

"Hm? Oh, me and my bro moved here months ago. Just thought I'd catch some sun...", Brad then patted his girl-filled gut and licked his lips. "Sample the local cuisine."

Mary's muffled screaming made you angry. You couldn't just let your girlfriend stew away in some big jerk's belly! "Y-you better let Mary out, you big bully!", you yelled.

"N-nuh uh!", you whined. "Don't you know what happens to people when you eat them here? They digest and get reformed the next day, you big dummy!"

11111.title: Mr. Steal Your Girl

111113.content:

As you sat in your damp, dark, and smelly prison, you were grossed out, and beyond upset. "I... I'm sorry, Mary!", you heard Jack cry. "He's gotta be lying! I'll go get some help to get you out!" You could barely hear his feet hit the sand as you continued to sit in your prison.

"Jackie! Where are you going?!", you screamed in a panic. "Aren't you gonna help me?!" You were shocked by your boyfriend's perceived selfishness. 1111131.title: Several Days Pass...

choices: Yes. He finally starts to digest you.
No. You remain a resident of Brad's belly forever.
1111132.content:
The sensation of chewed up food and liquid raining down on you and covering your body was a feeling you had unfortunately grown used to, as your stay in Brad's stomach became longer and longer. Not wanting to go hungry, you were forced to eat some of the chewed up, saliva-soaked food that your living prison had eaten. You couldn't eat too much, or Brad would just eat some more, and you'd have to sit in the gunk until he had digested it. Whenever he drank, you had to hold your hands together to catch whatever rained down. You had experienced your first taste of alcohol this way, and everything that came with it.

Meanwhile, Brad continued on with his routine. Although he had a large, little girl-filled gut, he kept on as if nothing was different. He'd keep up with college, date several women, and brought them home, forcing you to bounce around as he plowed them. Of course, he made sure to keep up his body, bringing you along with him as he worked out. You were uncomfortably compressed as he lifted weights and did sit ups, your predator not caring that he was practically crushing his belly's resident. He wasn't shy about showing you off, too, occasionally bumping you on your rear and making you squirm.

The days turned into weeks, and the weeks turned into months, and there was no sign that Jack was going to save you. It was tough to sleep as Brad always slept on his stomach, squashing you underneath his weight and snoring loudly. Whenever you did get some sleep, you always had the same dream. The evil dragon snatches the princess up and grins wickedly down at the knight. The princess pleads the knight for help, only for him to run away in fear as she was sent down to the monster's scaly gut.
You wanted to have faith in Jack, as well as your other friends and family, that they would save you from the belly of this bully. But a little girl can only hope for so long...

Finally, it came time for the holidays. Brad was at a party, wearing a Santa hat and a bow stuck onto his belly, with the words 'DON'T OPEN UNTIL XMAS' written on it. You wanted to cry, but you still had the slightest glimmer of hope that you would be freed. Maybe a Xmas miracle was in your future. You were somewhat inebriated as Brad had been heavily drinking, and you were up to your chin in alcohol and chewed up snacks as Brad slapped his belly. "Heya, kid. You still awake in there?", Brad asked.

"Y-yeah...", you responded sleepily.

"Haha! Wanna stay up to wait for Santa, huh?", the jock asked. He grabbed a microphone from a karaoke machine and held it to his gut. "What do ya want Santa to bring you, little lady?" The crowd went silent aside from a few giggles from the other college students. "C'mon! Tell us what you want for Xmas!"

You gulped down some more of the awful mixture that you were drenched in. "I... I want..." Your voice blared over the speakers as Brad recorded your frightened voice. "I want OUT OF HERE!!!", you screamed as loud as you could.

"Well, folks", Brad said over the karaoke machine. "Should Santa give her what she wants? Has she been a good girl this year?"

You could hear the other college students shouting. You could hear some chanting "YES!" while others were shouting "NO!". You couldn't believe your fate was in the hands of some drunk, horny young adults.

"Guess that settles it!", Brad said, though he gave no indication of what he meant. This was potentially your last chance to be free of this bully's gut. Will you get your Xmas wish?

132.content:
You're having a good day so far, maybe that was a little optimistic but you've gotta be if you live in Spectrum Bay and you're not very big. Jewel of course had gone ahead of you to school, and your mom was already gone so the peaceful breakfast made it a good start. You at least were happy that you could wake up at your own pace, even if it was harder getting to school when you weren't with Jewel. The bus would be the big hurdle today since you hadn't gotten up in time to join jewel on her walk there or catch a ride with your mother Jillian. You didn't often take the bus because of it's inherent dangers, namely the other students but it wasn't like running all the way would get you very far.

You tell yourself today would be different though, it wasn't that hard to get through a whole day without being squashed, you could definitely do it this time, even if the record was not in your favor. A breakfast bar was good enough and then it was only a short jog to the bus stop. The usual crowd was there, The hunt sisters Grace and Faith and Jenny O'hair as they were the students on your block. Jenny was barely paying attention to anything but her phone and the cow girls would hardly see you if you stood too close to them so you kept a 'safe' distance. When the bus pulled up you were the last one on so as to avoid being caught underfoot, you considered where to sit since this was one of the first stops only a couple of seats were filled unfortunately that meant you had to choose a spot someone else was unlikely to want. The front of course was highly coveted but at the same time it was very visible meaning that it was easy to avoid accidents of people not noticing you since they could even see you from outside of the bus. The middle seats were unpopular in general so it wasn't likely anyone would be picking them if they had the choice meaning you could possibly skip interaction all together. The last option was to go all the way to the back and try to take the seat that would cause the least problems when you needed to actually get off of the bus. You wished you had made a plan earlier.. "Hey kid bus is moving get in a seat."

You didn't have any more time you go to...

You are the daughter of the mayor of another popular city, Irma Solos, and were granted a boon by the Goddess Ishtef that gave you a squishy, malleable body that tasted of green apples. Your mother sent you to live in Spectrum Bay under the assumption that it was just an ordinary city filled with different peoples, attempting to rid you of your perverted nature and urges. However, you're still committed to trying to finish school. Your grades have always been poor because of how easy it is for you to get distracted by some cute boy's bulge and try to force yourself down his pants. This year, your grades are actually good, and you might have a chance to graduate this year (though, your attendance is still a problem).

143.content:
Your name is Ignacio Lopez. Most people who know you call you Iggy or Nacho for short (usually your roommates or employees). You have the thankless job of running the only fast food restaurant in town, Lucha Burger. Very rarely do you go a day without having trouble with either one of the customers or one of your employees. Although, even you admit that you're pretty stubborn at times. You hate having to deal with special orders or coupons, sometimes denying them outright. And you hate having to change your employees schedule up when they want to change their hours. This has led you to becoming pretty unpopular. As long as you get through the day in one piece, you don't really care.

Being the manager, you don't get much free time to yourself. What little free time you do get, you try to spend with your boyfriend, Rico. Because he's a fairly popular DJ though, your schedules don't always match up, but you still end up spending the night at each others houses often. For some reason, you aren't stubborn at all around him. You're always up for whatever he wants to do, even if it involves you spending hours with your face wedged between his fat asscheeks or being led around on a leash.

Your roommates get on your nerves sometimes, but they're too sweet for you to actually be mad at. They sometimes bring the kids that they babysit in the apartment, and have parties while you're trying to sleep. On more than one occasion, someone's sneaked into your room and had you as a snack while you were asleep.

You've been trying to keep up your reputation as a pred, but it's been pretty tough lately. Especially since the little slime guy, Dominic, has gotten a taste for you. It's pretty humiliating being prey for someone who's seen exclusively as prey themselves, but you kinda enjoy it. He's kind of cute, even if he's a couple hundred years your senior.


What's going on today?
143.title: Short, Grumpy Burger Boi

info.brief_description: Pick a citizen and try and make it through the day without incident.
info.description:
Spectrum Bay is a city full of various kinds of people, each more predatory than the last. Vore is commonplace, and there are several residents who's bodies are squishy and malleable (and rather tasty). Just because they're vulnerable, though, doesn't mean they're at the bottom of the food chain. With enough practice, anyone can be a predator... sometimes someone will simply shove themselves right up your booty!

There's more than just vore going on, though. If you aren't careful, you could be turned into a squishie, or even end up in someone's underwear drawer!

In a city full of different species of predators, it can be difficult to make it through the day without something going wrong.

A list of characters within the world of Spectrum Bay. You don't necessarily have to use someone from here.
https://sta.sh/21sw92n3ol6t

I've written numerous stories and made several comics with the city's residents.
The stories are here:
https://aryion.com/g4/view/483535
And the comics can be found here:
https://aryion.com/g4/view/626666

=====================================================================================================

Rules

1) Death isn't permanent. While some characters can be digested or smashed, they will walk out of the ocean and onto the beach once the sun sets as if nothing happened... though they'll walk out without their clothes.

2) You can switch to another character at any time. Just try to have the switch make sense.

3) Some characters are meant to only interact with certain characters. Please respect that.

4) Try to use proper grammar and punctuation.

5) Please keep chapter at a decent length. No one-sentence chapters. Bridge chapters are understandable, but try to limit them.

6) If you'd like, you can introduce your own character in the "new student" or "tourist" choices.

7) Just about anything is allowed. Magic/transformation/aliens/ect.
The only thing I won't allow is excessive gore and scat.
